Description: Extends the stay-at-home framework through May 15 while allowing limited retail reopening under conditions.
Primary Mobility Impact: Tempered rebound of commuting and discretionary trips; sustained low travel elasticity.

Policy: Mask mandates & Pause of high-risk venues
Description: City/county-level face covering requirements for public places and transit riders/operators.
Primary Mobility Impact: Reduced close-contact transmission risk on transit and in indoor venues.

Description: Events exceeding 50 people required local approval with mitigation measures.
Primary Mobility Impact: Constrained cross-city/cross-county travel surges tied to large events; reduced cluster risks.
